actions.name: closeChat
actions.description: Programmatically mark a chat as closed by its chat_id.

actions.name: findChat
actions.description: Look up a chat by parameters such as chat_id, phone, name, etc.

actions.name: findMessageStatus
actions.description: Lookup a messageâ€™s delivery status by message ID.

actions.name: findMessage
actions.description: Lookup a message by its WhatsApp message ID.

actions.name: findUploadedFile
actions.description: Locate an uploaded file by filename or identifier.

actions.name: findWhatsappAccount
actions.description: Search for a WhatsApp account (by phone or ID).

actions.name: sendFileToExistingChat
actions.description: Similar to above: send a file attachment to a chat using URL or file input and name.

actions.name: sendMessageToExistingChat
actions.description: Sends a text message in a chat identified by chat_id

actions.name: sendMessageToNewChat
actions.description: Create a new chat (new conversation) by specifying the WhatsApp account, phone number, and message.

actions.name: sendUploadedFileToExistingChat
actions.display_name: Send Uploaded File to Existing Chat
actions.description: Send a file (media/attachment) to a chat, with metadata like file name, via existing chat.

triggers.name: chatClosed
triggers.description: Fires when a chat is closed.

triggers.name: newIncomingChat
triggers.description: Fires when a new incoming chat (i.e. from a user) is created.

triggers.name: newOutgoingChat
triggers.description: Fires when a new outgoing chat is initiated.

triggers.name: newReceivedMessage
triggers.description: Fires when a message is received (incoming).

triggers.name: newSentMessage
triggers.description: Fires when a message is sent (outgoing).

triggers.name: newUploadedFile
triggers.description: Fires when a new file is uploaded in a chat.

triggers.name: newWhatsappAccount
triggers.description: Fires when a new WhatsApp account is added/registered.
